text: Jerzy Schindler (5 February 1923 - 10 May 1992) was a Polish alpine skier. He competed in two events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Polish male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Poland Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zakopane
title: Jerzy Schindler
